description: Main page component for the NoteEase frontend application, managing note states, routes, and interactions such as create, view, edit, delete, and search.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Selects a note by ID and switches to view mode.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Sets the mode to 'edit' for editing the selected note.

methods.name: startCreate
methods.description: Initializes creation mode by resetting selection and setting mode to 'create'.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and switches to list mode.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves a note; updates existing or adds new, then switches to view mode.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Sets search query and switches to search mode.
